Method Detail

getCurrentPlayers

IAFPlayer[] getCurrentPlayers()
This returns a snapshot of the known devices when the method was invoked.

Returns:
An array of all the devices that AirFlinger detected. OnPlayerStatusChange() callback should be used to monitor changes to this list. Important: once a device is added to the list, it is never removed. Namely, it can turn offline if disconnected or shutdown and then online again.
See Also:
AirFlinger.IEventCallback

getCurrentServers
